title: Exploring The Last Unicorn
description: In this lesson, students will dive into the story of 'The Last Unicorn' to understand what happens, explore the feelings and motivations of the characters, and make inferences from the text.

prompts.input: How do you think Jack feels when he hears about the unicorn? Explain why you think he feels that way.
hints: Think about how he reacts when Annie tells him about the unicorn.
Remember to look for clues in the text about his feelings.

prompts.input: Why do you think Annie is so excited about the unicorn and the adventure to New York City? Describe her motivations.
hints: Consider what she says about the unicorn and her past experiences.
Look for parts in the text that show her enthusiasm.

subject: Language Arts
